taskDescription: Polystyrene is produced commercially by reaction of styrene with butyllithium as an anionic initiator. Using resonance structures, explain how the chain-carrying intermediate is stabilized.
detailedSolution: The intermediate is a resonance-stabilized benzylic carbanion,
